article: Very few people were coming to eat at the White Rose Restaurant , and its owner did not know what to do . The price was reasonable and the food was of good quality , but nobody seemed to want to eat there . Then he did something that changed all that , and in a few weeks his restaurant is always full of men with their lady friends . Whenever a gentleman came in with a lady , a smiling waiter gave each of them a menu , The menu looked exactly the same on the outside , but there was an important difference inside . The menu that the waiter gave to the man supplied the correct price for each dish and each bottle of wine . while the menu that he gave to the lady supplied a much higher price ! So when the man calmly ordered dish after dish and wine after wine , the lady thought he was much more generous than he really was .
questions: According to the passage we can know that , generally speaking ,

model: women like their men friends to be generous
men do n ' t like to eat at the white rose restaurant
human: men like their lady friends to be generous .
women like their men friends to be generous
